etymology.description: phonetic 十 + semantic 口 ("mouth"); a container with a needle on top to indicate the sound; compare the bottom of the original 缶. Alt. view: a helmet (less likely).
etymology.interpretation: Graph suggests an opening or container (口) with a needle-like element on top, where 十 provides the sound and 口 contributes the idea of an opening or vessel. The notion of an opening or passage aligns with uses meaning “from/by way of,” while the phonetic element guided its reading.

examples.chinese: 由这条路走得更快(由這條路走得更快)。
examples.pinyin: Yóu zhè tiáo lù zǒu de gèng kuài.

examples.chinese: 事故是由刹车失灵引起的(事故是由剎車失靈引起的)。
examples.pinyin: Shìgù shì yóu shāchē shīlíng yǐnqǐ de.
examples.english: The accident was caused by brake failure.

examples.chinese: 这项决定由他来做(這項決定由他來做)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè xiàng juédìng yóu tā lái zuò.
examples.english: This decision is to be made by him.
